Title: Second Opinion
Plot: Allsion had a dream that takes place about 20 years in the future in which Marie dies of leukemia.  Upon waking up Allison is determined to keep Marie safe no matter what needs to be done.  Joe strongly disagrees with Allison's actions, and tries to convince her to stay rational.  Meanwhile Scanlon investigates the sudden death of a close friend.
GuestStars: Alan Ruck, Ruben C. Gonzalez, Marti Jo Pennisi, Josh Wingate, Lynette DuPree, Jack Bennett, Christopher Shaw, Will Beinbrink, Traber Burns, Nancy Bell, Alexandra French, Vondie Curtis-Hall, Jessica Lindsey, Tina
